sources.name: International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis (IIASA): World Population and Human Capital in the Twenty-First Century
sources.description:
International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis
Data providerIIASA
SourceWolfgang Lutz, William P. Butz, and Samir KC
DescriptionWorld population and human capital in the 21st century
Linkhttp://www.oeaw.ac.at/vid/dataexplorer/
Retrieved10/08/2015

Additional information

Citation: Lutz, Wolfgang, William P. Butz, and Samir. World population and human capital in the twenty-first century. Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2014.

The data on past and projected rates of educational attainment comes from the International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis (IIASA) and can be found here. These projections are constructed using current Global Economic Trends (GET). There are other scenarios available, including a best and worst case.
